description: this object represents a single change to a document. one or more commit(s) compile into a document

user.description: _id of user (assigned on submission based on token)

data.description: holds the json that is the commit - the parts of the doc that are updated (or the entire doc if it's new)

data_type.description: the schema that will be used to validate the data, and the type of doc that it compiles into

enabled.description: a boolean value telling whether or not this commit should be used. (this is assigned on submission as true)

time.description: unix time of commit (assigned on submission). this tells the order in which commits will be compiled into each other

doc_id.description: this identifies the document that the commit goes to (the _id of the doc). it is assigned on submission (as a random string, if this is the first commit in a doc) or provided (if it is a update to an existing doc)
